meanings.sent1: The river flowed freely, its unstopped current rushing downstream.
meanings.sent2: The unstopped traffic caused delays for commuters.
meanings.sent3: The unstopped waterfall made a beautiful natural display.
meanings.sent4: Her unstopped enthusiasm for learning was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The unstopped energy of the children filled the room with joy.

meanings.sent1: The unstopped bottle of soda fizzed when opened.
meanings.sent2: The unstopped jar of jam attracted ants in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The unstopped container spilled its contents all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: The unstopped leak in the roof caused water damage to the ceiling.
meanings.sent5: The unstopped package allowed the contents to scatter in the wind.

meanings.sent1: His unstopped laughter echoed through the room.
meanings.sent2: The unstopped child ran around the playground with excitement.
meanings.sent3: The unstopped puppy wagged its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: Her unstopped tears flowed freely down her cheeks.
meanings.sent5: The unstopped emotions overwhelmed him during the movie.
